<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shore Step](/Feats.aspx?ID=2971) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=52" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 198 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[wave order](/DruidicOrders.aspx?ID=7)

</column>

---

The shallows and tide pools have always called to you and let you pass unhindered. You ignore difficult terrain resulting from shallow water. In addition, if you roll a success on an [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) check to [Balance](/Actions.aspx?ID=28) on a slippery or wet surface, or on an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check to [Swim](/Actions.aspx?ID=39), you get a critical success instead.
name: Shore Step
